articles.description: Bikaji Foods IPO GMP today is  ₹40, which is  ₹13 higher from its Friday GMP, say market observers
articles.content: Bikaji Foods IPO: The initial public offer (IPO) of Bikaji Foods International Ltd got fully subscribed on second day of its subscription. Apart from this, after two days of successive losses, Indian… [+2038 chars]
